1: I lift up my eyes to You, O You Whose throne is in the heavens.
2: See, the eyes of servants look to the hand of their owner. The eyes of a woman servant look to the hand of her owner. So our eyes look to the Lord our God, until He shows us loving-kindness.
3: Show loving-kindness to us, O Lord. Show loving-kindness to us. For we have had our fill of hate.
4: The proud have laughed at us too long. We have had more than enough of their hate.
